        check_x_left = x == get_left([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_y_bottom = y == get_bottom([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_size = same_size([x,y], ctx)
        check_y_size = same_size([y,z], ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)

        check_b_below_a = are_below([b], [a], ctx)
        check_c_below_a = are_below([c], [a], ctx)
        check_b_left_of_a = are_left([b], [a], ctx)
        check_c_below_left_of_a = are_below([c], get_left([a,b], ctx), ctx)
        check_a_dark = is_dark(a, ctx)
        check_b_larger = are_larger([b], [a], ctx)
        check_b_light = is_light(b, ctx)

            check_abc_triangle
            and check_b_below_a
            and check_c_below_a
            and check_b_left_of_a
            and check_c_below_left_of_a
            and check_a_dark
            and check_b_larger
            and check_b_light
        ):
            results.append([a,b,c])
    return results
